/usr/bin/c++  -lncurses -lpthread -g   CMakeFiles/cChat2.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cChat2.dir/initWindows.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cChat2.dir/CCWindow.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cChat2.dir/WindowFiller.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cChat2.dir/fileParse.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cChat2.dir/ChatRoom.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cChat2.dir/connect.cpp.o  -o cChat2  -lncurses -lpthread
